original_text: When the bad spirit takes hold of him, it throws him to the ground. Water comes out of his mouth and he bites his teeth together. Then his body stops moving. I asked your disciples to send the spirit out of him. But they were not able to do it.’
korean_text: 귀신이 어디서든지 그를 잡으면 거꾸러져 거품을 흘리며 이를 갈며 그리고 파리해지는지라 내가 선생님의 제자들에게 내쫓아 달라 하였으나 그들이 능히 하지 못하더이다

sentences.original_text: When the bad spirit takes hold of him
it throws him to the ground
Water comes out of his mouth
and he bites his teeth together
to send the spirit out of him
But they were not able to do it
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 그것을 할 수 없었습니다
